---

## Features

- **Anonymous Chat** - Connect with random verified students instantly
- **Voice Call** - Talk anonymously with college students across India
- **Confessions** - Share and read anonymous confessions from your college
- **College Verified** - Only verified college students can join
- **100% Anonymous** - No names, no profiles, just pure conversations
- **End-to-End Encrypted** - Your chats are private and secure

---

## Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: Next.js, React, Material-UI
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express, Socket.io
- **Database**: MongoDB
- **Mobile**: Capacitor (Android/iOS)
- **Real-time**: WebRTC, PeerJS

---

## Development

```bash
# Install dependencies
npm install

# Run development server
npm run dev

# Build for production
npm run build

# Build Android APK
npx cap sync android
cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
```
